title: So Fast It Out-Paced the Order Book: Decathlon’s Van Rysel Super-Bike Sells Out in Hours
content:
The world's most wanted road bike? Replicas of the Van Rysel RCR Pro ridden by Decathlon Ag2r-La Mondiale sold out within hours of coming available for public pre-order.

Read the full article at So Fast It Out-Paced the Order Book: Decathlon’s Van Rysel Super-Bike Sells Out in Hours on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
